segments.text: Oh , God . It ’ s late . I ’ m afraid I have to leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you just got here . Can ’ t you stay a little longer and have some tea ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s very kind of you . But if I don ’ t go now I ’ ll miss the last bus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about next time we meet at my place ? And I ’ ll treat you to Chinese food . I know how much you like it . We can order in and watch video too . Anything you like , I promise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great idea . I ’ m looking forward to it . See you then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . I really do have to go .
segments.speaker: S1
